title: From City to Beach: The Ultimate Sri Lankan Adventure
description: Fall in love with the unspoiled beauty of Sri Lanka as you travel from its vibrant capital city, Colombo, all the way to Pottuvil - a surf paradise on the eastern coast of the country, on the ultimate city to beach getaway. Spend two nights at the stylish Jetwing Colombo Seven with daily breakfast and convenient airport transfers. Follow this with a stay at the newly opened beachfront Jetwing Surf Pottuvil, with daily breakfast, nightly dinners, a cocktail experience and transfers from Colombo included.

title: Sri Lanka Oceanside Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Club Lounge Access & Child Stays Free
description:
Make your way to Sri Lanka’s enchanting capital and indulge at this opulent hotel located mere steps from Galle Face Green. Discover a world of luxury retail at your fingertips thanks to direct access to One Galle Face Mall - home to over 200 retail outlets, including restaurants and bars along with a host of local and international brands.

Head to the world-renowned Chi, The Spa for a selection of indulgent treatments, or drop into the 24-hour Health Club and plunge into the expansive pool with a refreshing drink from the Pool Bar to top it off. Gourmands will love the extensive range of dining options onsite, including local and international cuisine, al fresco dining, live entertainment, innovative menus and stylish venues.

Beyond the hotel awaits a range of sights to explore, including the National Museum, Viharamahadevi Park and the Jami-Ul-Alfar Mosque.
offer_address: 1 Galle Face, Colombo 2, Colombo Western Province 00200, Sri Lanka

title: Colombo Heritage Oceanfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Saltwater Infinity Pool
description:
Experience timeless elegance at this luxurious retreat in the heart of Colombo. With a stunning 19th-century facade and a storied history as Sri Lanka's oldest hotel, it seamlessly blends heritage with modern indulgence. Enjoy an array of contemporary amenities, including six onsite restaurants and bars, and Colombo's only saltwater infinity pool, offering breathtaking views of the Indian Ocean.

You'll have the chance to sample the city's finest cuisines, from high-end afternoon teas at The Verandah to modern fine dining at 1864 LIMITED EDITION. For
relaxed beachside cocktails at sunset head to Firebeach, the hotel's take on the classic beach club, or grab a bite to eat at beloved local pub In... On The Green.

Explore the nearby Galle Face Green, Colombo's popular seaside promenade, or venture into the vibrant city streets, teeming with local markets, historic landmarks and cultural treasures.

title: Five-Star Central Colombo Stay with VIP Club Access
description:
Uncover Sri Lanka’s vibrant capital with a five-star stay at the centrally located Hilton Colombo. The city’s scenic waterfront, temples and best restaurants are within easy reach from this award-winning property. Your stay includes daily buffet breakfast with interactive cooking stations at Graze Kitchen and Executive Club Lounge access with the option of VIP breakfast in the lounge, afternoon tea (3pm-6pm), free Wi-Fi and a nightly happy hour (6pm-8.30pm) with free-flow premium drinks and canapés.

**Make the most of your time in Sri Lanka with additional stays**: discover our exclusive offer for [KK Beach](https://luxuryescapes.com/offer/kk-beach-sri-lanka-near-galle/0060I00000bii4rQAA) in the historic coastal city of Galle and [Kahanda Kanda](https://luxuryescapes.com/offer/kahanda-kanda-sri-lanka/0060I00000bfxBnQAI) , nestled amidst the palm-fringed jungle and tea plantations near Galle Fort.
offer_address: 2 Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner, Mawatha, 00200, Sri Lanka

title: Boutique Colombo All-Suite Escape in Converted Heritage Mansion with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Step into a world of charm and timeless elegance at this enchanting 180-year-old colonial-style sanctuary in the heart of Sri Lanka's bustling capital, Colombo. Immerse yourself in a tranquil oasis just moments away from the city's vibrant shopping district, historic landmarks and the renowned Gangaramaya Temple, Colombo's largest and most iconic.

Savour Sri Lanka's exquisite flavours at Rare, the hotel's renowned restaurant boasting Colombo's largest whiskey collection. Unwind with a dip in the inviting outdoor pool and enjoy easy access to city's dynamic arts scene, with the National Museum just a five-minute stroll away.

title: From City to Beach: The Ultimate Sri Lankan Adventure
description: Fall in love with the unspoiled beauty of Sri Lanka as you travel from its vibrant capital city, Colombo, all the way to Pottuvil - a surf paradise on the eastern coast of the country, on the ultimate city to beach getaway. Spend two nights at the stylish Jetwing Colombo Seven with daily breakfast and convenient airport transfers. Follow this with a stay at the newly opened beachfront Jetwing Surf Pottuvil, with daily breakfast, nightly dinners, a cocktail experience and transfers from Colombo included.

title: Colombo Five-Star Oceanside Shangri-La Stay with Direct One Galle Face Mall Access
description:
Make your way to Sri Lanka's enchanting capital and indulge in a well-deserved stay at Shangri-La Colombo, located mere steps from Galle Face Beach. Discover a world of luxury retail at your fingertips thanks to direct access to Shangri-La’s own One Galle Face Mall - home to over 200 retail outlets including restaurants and bars along with a host of local and international brands - along with signature Shangri-La facilities onsite. Head to the world-renowned Chi, The Spa for a selection of indulgent treatments, or drop into the 24-hour Health Club and plunge into the expansive pool. Gourmands will love the extensive range of dining options onsite, including Shang Palace, Central, Capital Bar & Grill, Sapphyr Lounge, Cake Temptations by Shangri-La Colombo or visit the exclusive Horizon Club Lounge.

Beyond the hotel awaits a range of sights to explore, including the National Museum, Galle Face Green, Viharamahadevi Park and the Jami-Ul-Alfar Mosque.

title: Sri Lanka Five-Star 18th-Century Manor House Escape with Tropical Gardens & Oasis-Style Pool
description: Experience the epitome of colonial elegance at The Wallawwa, a beautifully restored 18th-century manor house in Sri Lanka. This secluded sanctuary, set amidst lush tropical gardens, is just outside the bustling city of Colombo and an easy drive from the idyllic Negombo Beach. Indulge in the local cuisine at The Verandah serving top-notch Asian fusion, or simply unwind at the lavish Z Spa. With its blend of luxury and authenticity, The Wallawwa is your gateway to the exotic wonders of Sri Lanka.
offer_address: Minuwangoda-Gampaha-Miriswatta Road, Kotugoda 11450, Colombo, Sri Lanka
